description.value:
Quite a few in Eorzea in particular do not pay reverence to just one of the Twelve, but rather they worship them all as a collective pantheon. In this capacity, The Twelve are worshipped as the protectors and stewards of life on the star, and have known to be called upon - often unsuccessfully - to render aid in times of need. Followers of The Twelve believe it is best to maintain an unbiased opinion of each of the Twelve Gods.

Edicts protect your homeland; stand up against tyranny; fell primals as they appear

Anathema betray those of your homeland; slander any of the gods
